desc: Filtration up to 99% of all PM : PM2.5, PM0.3 made up of 5-Ply. Cotton Layer filtrates large dust particulates PM10, cool stylish black, blue, pink. Micron Bio-Filter Layer filtrates the bacteria, germs, viruses and allergies. Activated Carbon Layers stops exhaust, smoke, pollen, particulates and reduce smells and odor

layout.text: Protect yourself with an Ultra Slim Air Mask
The first 5-layer filter mask designed in the USA will keep you safe against the smallest 0.3μm particles in the air
